userreviews.userReview: What can I say? Gotta know my grammar if I'm going to be an author. At first it seemed they were rehashing the material in the first book, but after keeping at it, now I can say what kind of speech any word in a sentence is, whether it's a subject, verb, participle, preposition, adjective, adverb, conjuction, gerund, predicate (verb phrase), participial phrase, or an adverbial phrase. And I can conjugate a verb in all six tenses, if need be.

description: This 607 page book is the Second Course in the Warriner's English Grammar and Composition Series.
title: English Grammar & Composition: Course 8
